name: Rodina
title: Blizard's Sniper

skillInfo.name: Penetration Shot
skillInfo.description: Upon activation, takes up a stance and starts casting. After casting ends, deals ??? P.DMG upon enemies in a straight line. DMG is increased by 150% in proportion to the total casting time. If casting progresses beyond the 3rd stage, knock over enemies.

skills.dark: Gain CC immunity while using said skill.

uniqueTreasure.name: Shock-absorbing Special Guard
effect: [Penetration Shot] Takes 40% reduced P.DMG and M.DMG for the skill's duration, and upon Critical Hit, increases own ATK by 10% for 10 sec. ATK increase can be stacked up to max 4 times.

profile.likes: Bears, polar bears, grizzly bears, small bears, large bears
profile.dislikes: Those who do not value live

background.story: The empire's top ranking sniper, and a lover of bears. She likes them so much that she always wears accessories resembling a bear's ears on her hat. So, she'll sometimes hunts tigers, but she'll never shoot a bear. Although her shooting skills are most suitable for assassination, she swore to never use them for unjust reasons. Instead, she uses them to protect others. Currently, she lives with Pavel in the Windland Snow Mountain as his personal guard delegated by the empire.

itemIntroductions.weapon: The essence of the most sophisticated imperial technology. Requiring superhuman precision, this rifle cannot be handled by a regular person. It has been magically enchanted to allow the shooter to see impossibly long distances. Even the greatest scope in the world, however, is useless in the hands of someone who can't aim with it. As such, the performance of this rifle has significantly depended on the skills of its users. Rodina, gifted with superb vision and precise control, is a suitable owner of this rifle. She went one step further and customized it to her preference, naming it Rodina Custom.
treasures: A special shoulder guard that Fluss struggled to get for petite Rodina. It is very hard and sturdy as it was made with Black Larva leather. It is one of Rodina's favorite items since it has great recoil absorption.
A sniper rifle support that Pavel made so that it would fit Rodina's small body. It's made of crystals so it's very firm and sturdy. This support is enough to aim at any target.

A barrage that was requested to the legendary blacksmith of the empire. It contains gunpowder made from the sturdy egg of a pitta and the jaw bone of a dragon turtle. It was made small so that Rodina can use it easily, but it has the power to destroy anything.

A magazine about firearms being issued in the Empire. Issued regularly by Magos Le'Flamme, this firearms encyclopedia is Rodina's favorite magazine that contains various information about cutting-edge guns and weapons. Rodina has more faith in this magazine than she does for other magazines because it is edited under the supervision of Chief Director Valance, who Rodina is a big fan of.
